mapper.select: SELECT a.ID id,DATE_FORMAT(a.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%s') createTime,d.ADDRESS_INFO address, c.ID box_id,c.NAME name, c.TITLE title,c.DETAIL detail,c.IMAGE_ADDRESS imageAddress,c.BOX_PRICE price, b.ORDER_WAY orderWay,b.ORDER_COUNT orderCount,b.SEND_COUNT sendCount FROM orders a LEFT JOIN ORDER_BOX_REF b ON a.ID = b.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN BOX c ON c.ID = b.BOX_ID LEFT JOIN ADDRESS d ON a.ADDRESS_ID = d.ID WHERE a.USER_ID = #{userid} and a.status='未付款'
